= Introduction =

This page discusses some of the design highlights of jSCEP

= Details =

== Requester Builder ==

In order to create a new [[http://code.google.com/p/jscep/source/browse/trunk/src/main/com/google/code/jscep/Requester.java Requester]] instance, application clients must use the Requester.Builder class to build up the arguments.
